alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 2:08PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN PHELPS... SOUTHWESTERN BUFFALO...NORTHEASTERN GOSPER AND SOUTHEASTERN DAWSON COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM CDT... At 208 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bertrand, or 13 miles northwest of Holdrege, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Overton around 225 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 242 and 258. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
